hooks.command: export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home" && echo "✓ Java runtime configured: $JAVA_HOME"
hooks.description: Auto-configure Android Studio Java runtime for Gradle commands

hooks.command: export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home" && echo "⏳ Running tests before push..." && ./gradlew test --quiet > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ Tests passed - safe to push" || (echo "✗ Tests failing - please fix before pushing" && exit 1)
hooks.description: Pre-push safety gate: Ensure tests pass before pushing code

hooks.command: export JAVA_HOME="/Applications/Android Studio.app/Contents/jbr/Contents/Home" && echo "⏳ Verifying tests before creating PR..." && ./gradlew test --quiet > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo "✓ Tests passed - ready to create PR" || (echo "✗ Tests failing - please fix before creating PR" && exit 1)
hooks.description: Pre-PR quality gate: Ensure tests pass before creating pull request
